metadataAttributes.Title: Natural Language Processing Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Break into NLP. Master cutting-edge NLP techniques through four hands-on courses! Updated with the latest techniques in October '21.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Word2vec, Machine Translation, Sentiment Analysis, Transformers, Attention Models, Word Embeddings, Locality-Sensitive Hashing, Vector Space Models, Parts-of-Speech Tagging, N-gram Language Models, Autocorrect, Word Embedding,
